QuestData.Title: Flashing Siren
QuestData.Description:
<Despite the robot being destroyed, the siren continues flashing.
Clearly this was a key sentry of King Mechagon. The citizens of Rustbolt will want to know of its demise.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Flashing Siren to Vera Lonelycog in Rustbolt on Mechagon Island.
